DataElement.preferredName: Person Pincer Grip 1 To 1 Left Hand Measurement Pressure Pound Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value to represent the Pincer grip strength generated in a prehension pattern of the tip of the left thumb opposing the index finger of the same hand, measured in pounds.
